title: My task
description: Why this exists; what done looks like.

title: ValidatorSpec contract + tests
description: Define ValidatorSpec Zod schema in src/contracts/validator_spec.ts: id (string min 1, stable e.g. 'name-required'), version (string min 1, e.g. '0.1'). This is metadata for validators. Write contract tests.

title: Module exports (mod.ts barrel files)
description: Wire up barrel exports: src/contracts/mod.ts re-exports all contract schemas/types. src/validate/mod.ts re-exports validators. src/elements/mod.ts (empty placeholder). src/mod.ts re-exports all three. Run deno check src/mod.ts to verify.

title: Repo skeleton + deno.jsonc
description: Create directory layout (src/contracts/, src/elements/, src/validate/, tests/, tests/contracts/, tests/fixtures/) and deno.jsonc with tasks (test, test:watch, fmt, lint, check, ci) and zod import map.

title: validateNameRequired - first invariant (TDD)
description: TDD workflow: 1) Write failing tests first in tests/validate/name_required_test.ts (flags unnamed button, passes named button, walks nested children). 2) Implement src/validate/nameable.ts with validateNameRequired(root: SemanticNode): Finding[]. Interactive types (button, link, textbox, checkbox, radio) must have a non-empty name. Walk tree recursively, return Finding[] with code='missing-name'.

title: CI pipeline + local git hooks
description: 1) Verify deno task ci works (fmt --check, lint, test -A). 2) Set up git pre-commit hook that runs deno task ci. Use a simple .git/hooks/pre-commit script (no husky/lefthook overhead). 3) Optionally add deno task pre-commit alias. Goal: broken contracts can never be committed.

title: Finding contract + tests
description: Define Finding Zod schema in src/contracts/finding.ts: code (string min 1), path (string min 1, JSONPath-ish), message (string min 1). This is the standard validation result shape. Write tests confirming parse/reject behavior.

title: ElementSpec contract + tests
description: Define ElementSpec Zod schema in src/contracts/element_spec.ts: tag (string min 1), attrs (record of string, default {}), text (optional string), children (recursive lazy array, default []). This is the renderable DOM-ish shape. Write tests confirming rejects empty tag, defaults attrs/children.

title: SemanticNode contract + tests
description: Define SemanticNode Zod schema in src/contracts/semantic_node.ts: type (string, min 1), name (optional string), role (optional string), props (record, default {}), children (recursive lazy array, default []). Write tests in tests/contracts/semantic_node_test.ts: parses minimal node, rejects empty type, handles nested children.

title: Smoke test - prove toolchain
description: Create tests/smoke_test.ts with a trivial assertion (assertEquals 1+1, 2). Run deno task test and confirm green. This proves the test runner, permissions model, and import map are sane.
